abstract: A federal judge in New Orleans ordered the Obama administration to move quickly on permits for new deepwater oil wells in the Gulf of Mexico.
snippet: A federal judge in New Orleans ordered the Obama administration to move quickly on permits for new deepwater oil wells in the Gulf of Mexico.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  A federal judge in New Orleans on Thursday ordered the Obama administration to move quickly on permits for new deepwater oil wells in the Gulf of Mexico, saying that the government could no longer justify long delays in allowing new projects to go forward.

headline.main: Judge Tells Government to Resume Permits for Drilling
headline.print_headline: Judge Tells Government to Resume Permits for Drilling
